pli-tv-kd3:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-kd3:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ vassāvāso apaññatto hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:1.1.3_0: Tedha bhikkhū hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṁ caranti.
pli-tv-kd3:1.2.2_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṁ carissanti,
pli-tv-kd3:1.2.3_0: Ime hi nāma aññatitthiyā durakkhātadhammā vassāvāsaṁ allīyissanti saṅkasāyissanti.
pli-tv-kd3:1.2.4_0: Ime hi nāma sakuntakā rukkhaggesu kulāvakāni karitvā vassāvāsaṁ allīyissanti saṅkasāyissanti.
pli-tv-kd3:1.2.5_0: Ime pana samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṁ caranti,
pli-tv-kd3:1.3.1_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:1.3.2_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:1.3.3_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd3:2.2.6_0: Aparajjugatāya āsāḷhiyā purimikā upagantabbā, māsagatāya āsāḷhiyā pacchimikā upagantabbā—
pli-tv-kd3:3.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagantvā antarāvassaṁ cārikaṁ caranti.
pli-tv-kd3:3.1.3_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṁ carissanti,
pli-tv-kd3:3.1.4_0: Ime hi nāma aññatitthiyā durakkhātadhammā vassāvāsaṁ allīyissanti saṅkasāyissanti.
pli-tv-kd3:3.1.5_0: Ime hi nāma sakuntakā rukkhaggesu kulāvakāni karitvā vassāvāsaṁ allīyissanti saṅkasāyissanti.
pli-tv-kd3:3.1.6_0: Ime pana samaṇā sakyaputtiyā hemantampi gimhampi vassampi cārikaṁ caranti,
pli-tv-kd3:3.2.1_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:3.2.2_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd3:3.2.3_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagantvā antarāvassaṁ cārikaṁ carissantī”ti?
pli-tv-kd3:3.2.4_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:3.2.5_0: atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd3:3.2.6_2: vassaṁ upagantvā purimaṁ vā temāsaṁ pacchimaṁ vā temāsaṁ avasitvā cārikā pakkamitabbā.
pli-tv-kd3:4.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū na icchanti vassaṁ upagantuṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:4.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū tadahu vassūpanāyikāya vassaṁ anupagantukāmā sañcicca āvāsaṁ atikkamanti.
pli-tv-kd3:4.2.3_0: “Na, bhikkhave, tadahu vassūpanāyikāya vassaṁ anupagantukāmena sañcicca āvāso atikkamitabbo.
pli-tv-kd3:4.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vassaṁ ukkaḍḍhitukāmo bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pāhesi—
pli-tv-kd3:5.1.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā rājagahe yathābhirantaṁ viharitvā yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-kd3:5.1.2_0: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi tadavasari.
pli-tv-kd3:5.1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-kd3:5.1.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena kosalesu janapade udenena upāsakena saṅghaṁ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.1.6_0: “āgacchantu bhadantā, icchāmi dānañca dātuṁ, dhammañca sotuṁ, bhikkhū ca passitun”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.2.3_0: ‘na vassaṁ upagantvā purimaṁ vā temāsaṁ pacchimaṁ vā temāsaṁ avasitvā cārikā pakkamitabbā’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.2.4_0: Āgametu udeno upāsako, yāva bhikkhū vassaṁ vasanti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.2.6_0: Sace panassa accāyikaṁ karaṇīyaṁ, tattheva āvāsikānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ santike vihāraṁ patiṭṭhāpetū”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.3.2_0: “kathañhi nāma bhadantā mayā pahite na āgacchissanti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.3.4_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū udenassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-kd3:5.3.5_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:5.4.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe dhammiṁ kathaṁ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-kd3:5.4.2_0: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sattannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena pahite gantuṁ, na tveva appahite.
pli-tv-kd3:5.4.3_0: Bhikkhussa, bhikkhuniyā, sikkhamānāya, sāmaṇerassa, sāmaṇeriyā, upāsakassa, upāsikāya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.4.4_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imesaṁ sattannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena pahite gantuṁ, na tveva appahite.
pli-tv-kd3:5.5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsakena saṅghaṁ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.5.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.6.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsakena saṅghaṁ uddissa aḍḍhayogo kārāpito hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.6.21_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.7.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsakena sambahule bhikkhū uddissa …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.7.2_0: ekaṁ bhikkhuṁ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.7.23_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.8.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsakena bhikkhunisaṅghaṁ uddissa …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.8.9_0: ekaṁ sāmaṇeriṁ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.8.27_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.9.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsakena attano atthāya nivesanaṁ kārāpitaṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.9.28_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.9.29_0: ‘āgacchantu bhadantā, imaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇissanti, purāyaṁ suttanto palujjatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.9.30_0: Aññataraṁ vā panassa kiccaṁ hoti—karaṇīyaṁ vā, so ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.10.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsikāya saṅghaṁ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.10.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.11.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsikāya saṅghaṁ uddissa aḍḍhayogo kārāpito hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.11.21_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.12.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsikāya sambahule bhikkhū uddissa …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.12.12_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, upāsikāya attano atthāya nivesanaṁ kārāpitaṁ hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.12.39_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.12.40_0: ‘āgacchantu ayyā, imaṁ suttantaṁ pariyāpuṇissanti, purāyaṁ suttanto palujjatī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:5.12.41_0: Aññataraṁ vā panassā kiccaṁ hoti karaṇīyaṁ vā, sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:5.13.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā saṅghaṁ uddissa …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:5.13.35_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya …
pli-tv-kd3:6.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.1.3_0: “ahañhi gilāno, āgacchantu bhikkhū, icchāmi bhikkhūnaṁ āgatan”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.1.5_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañcannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena appahitepi gantuṁ, pageva pahite.
pli-tv-kd3:6.1.7_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imesaṁ pañcannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena appahitepi gantuṁ, pageva pahite.
pli-tv-kd3:6.2.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.2.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa anabhirati uppannā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.3.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.3.4_0: ‘anabhirataṁ vūpakāsessāmi vā, vūpakāsāpessāmi vā, dhammakathaṁ vāssa karissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa kukkuccaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.4.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.4.4_0: ‘kukkuccaṁ vinodessāmi vā, vinodāpessāmi vā, dhammakathaṁ vāssa karissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.5.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.5.4_0: ‘diṭṭhigataṁ vivecessāmi vā, vivecāpessāmi vā, dhammakathaṁ vāssa karissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.6.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu garudhammaṁ ajjhāpanno hoti parivāsāraho.
pli-tv-kd3:6.6.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.6.4_0: ‘parivāsadānaṁ ussukkaṁ karissāmi vā, anussāvessāmi vā, gaṇapūrako vā bhavissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.7.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mūlāyapaṭikassanāraho hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.7.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.7.4_0: ‘mūlāya paṭikassanaṁ ussukkaṁ karissāmi vā, anussāvessāmi vā, gaṇapūrako vā bhavissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.8.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu mānattāraho hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.8.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.8.4_0: ‘mānattadānaṁ ussukkaṁ karissāmi vā, anussāvessāmi vā, gaṇapūrako vā bhavissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.9.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abbhānāraho hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.9.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.9.4_0: ‘abbhānaṁ ussukkaṁ karissāmi vā, anussāvessāmi vā, gaṇapūrako vā bhavissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.10.1_2: bhikkhussa saṅgho kammaṁ kattukāmo hoti tajjanīyaṁ vā,
pli-tv-kd3:6.10.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.10.4_0: ‘kinti nu kho saṅgho kammaṁ na kareyya, lahukāya vā pariṇāmeyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.11.1_0: Kataṁ vā panassa hoti saṅghena kammaṁ tajjanīyaṁ vā niyassaṁ vā pabbājanīyaṁ vā paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā ukkhepanīyaṁ vā.
pli-tv-kd3:6.11.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.12.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.12.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.13.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā anabhirati uppannā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.13.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.13.4_0: ‘anabhirataṁ vūpakāsessāmi vā, vūpakāsāpessāmi vā, dhammakathaṁ vāssā karissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.14.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā kukkuccaṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.14.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.14.4_0: ‘kukkuccaṁ vinodessāmi vā, vinodāpessāmi vā, dhammakathaṁ vāssā karissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.15.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā diṭṭhigataṁ uppannaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.15.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.15.4_0: ‘diṭṭhigataṁ vivecessāmi vā, vivecāpessāmi vā, dhammakathaṁ vāssā karissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.16.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī garudhammaṁ ajjhāpannā hoti mānattārahā.
pli-tv-kd3:6.16.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.17.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī mūlāya paṭikassanārahā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.17.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.18.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī abbhānārahā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.18.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.19.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyā saṅgho kammaṁ kattukāmo hoti—
pli-tv-kd3:6.19.2_0: tajjanīyaṁ vā, niyassaṁ vā, pabbājanīyaṁ vā, paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā, ukkhepanīyaṁ vā.
pli-tv-kd3:6.19.3_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.19.5_0: ‘kinti nu kho saṅgho kammaṁ na kareyya, lahukāya vā pariṇāmeyyā’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.20.1_0: Kataṁ vā panassā hoti saṅghena kammaṁ—
pli-tv-kd3:6.20.2_0: tajjanīyaṁ vā, niyassaṁ vā, pabbājanīyaṁ vā, paṭisāraṇīyaṁ vā, ukkhepanīyaṁ vā.
pli-tv-kd3:6.20.3_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.21.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sikkhamānā gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.21.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.22.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sikkhamānāya anabhirati uppannā hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:6.22.5_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.23.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sikkhamānā upasampajjitukāmā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.23.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.23.4_0: ‘upasampadaṁ ussukkaṁ karissāmi vā, anussāvessāmi vā, gaṇapūrako vā bhavissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.24.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sāmaṇero gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.24.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.25.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerassa anabhirati uppannā hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:6.25.5_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.26.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sāmaṇero upasampajjitukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.26.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.26.4_0: ‘upasampadaṁ ussukkaṁ karissāmi vā, anussāvessāmi vā, gaṇapūrako vā bhavissāmī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.27.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.27.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.28.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sāmaṇeriyā anabhirati uppannā hoti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:6.28.5_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:6.29.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, sāmaṇerī sikkhaṁ samādiyitukāmā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:6.29.2_0: Sā ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:7.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno mātā gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.1.3_0: “ahañhi gilānā, āgacchatu me putto, icchāmi puttassa āgatan”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.1.6_0: ‘sattannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena pahite gantuṁ, na tveva appahite;
pli-tv-kd3:7.1.7_0: pañcannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena appahitepi gantuṁ, pageva pahite’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.1.8_0: Ayañca me mātā gilānā, sā ca anupāsikā, kathaṁ nu kho mayā paṭipajjitabban”ti?
pli-tv-kd3:7.2.1_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, sattannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena appahitepi gantuṁ, pageva pahite.
pli-tv-kd3:7.2.2_0: Bhikkhussa, bhikkhuniyā, sikkhamānāya, sāmaṇerassa, sāmaṇeriyā, mātuyā ca pitussa ca—
pli-tv-kd3:7.2.3_0: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imesaṁ sattannaṁ sattāhakaraṇīyena appahitepi gantuṁ, pageva pahite.
pli-tv-kd3:7.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa mātā gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.3.2_0: Sā ce puttassa santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:7.4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa pitā gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.4.2_0: So ce puttassa santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:7.5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa bhātā gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.5.2_0: So ce bhātuno santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:7.6.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa bhaginī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.6.2_0: Sā ce bhātuno santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:7.7.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhussa ñātako gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.7.2_0: So ce bhikkhussa santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:7.8.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhugatiko gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:7.8.2_0: So ce bhikkhūnaṁ santike dūtaṁ pahiṇeyya—
pli-tv-kd3:8.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena saṅghassa vihāro undriyati.
pli-tv-kd3:8.1.2_0: Aññatarena upāsakena araññe bhaṇḍaṁ chedāpitaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:8.1.4_0: “sace bhadantā taṁ bhaṇḍaṁ āvahāpeyyuṁ, dajjāhaṁ taṁ bhaṇḍan”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena kosalesu janapade aññatarasmiṁ āvāse vassūpagatā bhikkhū vāḷehi ubbāḷhā honti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.1.4_0: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatā bhikkhū vāḷehi ubbāḷhā honti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.1.8_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatā bhikkhū sarīsapehi ubbāḷhā honti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.2.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatā bhikkhū corehi ubbāḷhā honti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.2.5_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatā bhikkhū pisācehi ubbāḷhā honti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ gāmo agginā daḍḍho hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.3.5_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ senāsanaṁ agginā daḍḍhaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ gāmo udakena vūḷho hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:9.4.5_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagatānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ senāsanaṁ udakena vūḷhaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:10.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṁ āvāse vassūpagatānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ gāmo corehi vuṭṭhāsi.
pli-tv-kd3:10.1.9_0: “Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yena saddhā pasannā tena gantun”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena kosalesu janapade aññatarasmiṁ āvāse vassūpagatā bhikkhū na labhiṁsu lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.1.3_2: vassūpagatā bhikkhū na labhanti lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.1.6_2: vassūpagatā bhikkhū labhanti lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ,
pli-tv-kd3:11.2.1_2: vassūpagatā bhikkhū labhanti lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ,
pli-tv-kd3:11.2.4_2: vassūpagatā bhikkhū labhanti lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṁ pāripūriṁ,
pli-tv-kd3:11.3.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagataṁ bhikkhuṁ itthī nimanteti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.3.4_0: ‘lahuparivattaṁ kho cittaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, siyāpi me brahmacariyassa antarāyo’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.4.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagataṁ bhikkhuṁ vesī nimanteti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:11.4.10_0: ‘lahuparivattaṁ kho cittaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, siyāpi me brahmacariyassa antarāyo’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.4.12_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu assāmikaṁ nidhiṁ passati.
pli-tv-kd3:11.4.14_0: ‘lahuparivattaṁ kho cittaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā, siyāpi me brahmacariyassa antarāyo’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu passati sambahule bhikkhū saṅghabhedāya parakkamante.
pli-tv-kd3:11.5.4_0: mā mayi sammukhībhūte saṅgho bhijjī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.5.6_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.5.7_0: ‘asukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū saṅghabhedāya parakkamantī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.5.10_0: mā mayi sammukhībhūte saṅgho bhijjī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.6.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.6.2_0: ‘asukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū saṅghabhedāya parakkamantī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.6.5_0: Tyāhaṁ vakkhāmi “garuko kho, āvuso, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā;
pli-tv-kd3:11.6.7_0: Karissanti me vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.7.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.7.2_0: ‘asukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulā bhikkhū saṅghabhedāya parakkamantī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.7.5_0: api ca ye tesaṁ mittā, te me mittā.
pli-tv-kd3:11.7.7_0: Te vuttā te vakkhanti “garuko kho, āvuso, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā;
pli-tv-kd3:11.7.9_0: Karissanti tesaṁ vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.8.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.8.2_0: ‘asukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saṅgho bhinno’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.8.5_0: Tyāhaṁ vakkhāmi “garuko kho, āvuso, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā;
pli-tv-kd3:11.8.7_0: Karissanti me vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.9.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.9.2_0: ‘asukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saṅgho bhinno’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.9.5_0: api ca ye tesaṁ mittā te me mittā.
pli-tv-kd3:11.9.7_0: Te vuttā te vakkhanti “garuko kho, āvuso, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā;
pli-tv-kd3:11.9.9_0: Karissanti tesaṁ vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.10.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.10.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulā bhikkhuniyo saṅghabhedāya parakkamantī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.10.5_0: Tāhaṁ vakkhāmi “garuko kho, bhaginiyo, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā;
pli-tv-kd3:11.10.7_0: Karissanti me vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.11.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.11.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulā bhikkhuniyo saṅghabhedāya parakkamantī’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.11.5_0: Api ca yā tāsaṁ mittā, tā me mittā.
pli-tv-kd3:11.11.7_0: Tā vuttā tā vakkhanti “garuko kho, bhaginiyo, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā.
pli-tv-kd3:11.11.9_0: Karissanti tāsaṁ vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.12.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.12.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulāhi bhikkhunīhi saṅgho bhinno’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.12.5_0: Tāhaṁ vakkhāmi “garuko kho, bhaginiyo, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā.
pli-tv-kd3:11.12.7_0: Karissanti me vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:11.13.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, vassūpagato bhikkhu suṇāti—
pli-tv-kd3:11.13.2_0: ‘amukasmiṁ kira āvāse sambahulāhi bhikkhunīhi saṅgho bhinno’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:11.13.5_0: Api ca yā tāsaṁ mittā tā me mittā.
pli-tv-kd3:11.13.7_0: Tā vuttā tā vakkhanti “garuko kho, bhaginiyo, saṅghabhedo vutto bhagavatā;
pli-tv-kd3:11.13.9_0: Karissanti tāsaṁ vacanaṁ, sussūsissanti, sotaṁ odahissantī’ti, pakkamitabbaṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:12.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu vaje vassaṁ upagantukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya satthena gantukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.2.4_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya nāvāya gantukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū rukkhasusire vassaṁ upagacchanti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.4.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū rukkhaviṭabhiyā vassaṁ upagacchanti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū ajjhokāse vassaṁ upagacchanti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.6.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū asenāsanikā vassaṁ upagacchanti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.7.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chavakuṭikāya vassaṁ upagacchanti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.8.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū chatte vassaṁ upagacchanti.
pli-tv-kd3:12.9.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū cāṭiyā vassaṁ upagacchanti.
pli-tv-kd3:13.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyā saṅghena evarūpā katikā katā hoti—
pli-tv-kd3:13.1.3_0: Visākhāya migāramātuyā nattā bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā pabbajjaṁ yāci.
pli-tv-kd3:13.1.5_0: “saṅghena kho, āvuso, evarūpā katikā katā ‘antarāvassaṁ na pabbājetabban’ti.
pli-tv-kd3:13.1.6_0: Āgamehi, āvuso, yāva bhikkhū vassaṁ vasanti.
pli-tv-kd3:13.1.8_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā visākhāya migāramātuyā nattāraṁ etadavocuṁ—
pli-tv-kd3:13.2.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū visākhāya migāramātuyā ujjhāyantiyā khiyyantiyā vipācentiyā.
pli-tv-kd3:13.2.6_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-kd3:14.1.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā upanandena sakyaputtena rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.1.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto addasa antarāmagge dve āvāse bahucīvarake.
pli-tv-kd3:14.1.6_0: So tesu dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṁ vasi.
pli-tv-kd3:14.1.7_0: Rājā pasenadi kosalo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-kd3:14.1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma ayyo upanando sakyaputto amhākaṁ vassāvāsaṁ paṭissuṇitvā visaṁvādessati.
pli-tv-kd3:14.1.9_0: Nanu bhagavatā anekapariyāyena musāvādo garahito, musāvādā veramaṇī pasatthā”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:14.2.1_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū rañño pasenadissa kosalassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.2.2_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-kd3:14.2.3_0: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā upanando sakyaputto rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassāvāsaṁ paṭissuṇitvā visaṁvādessati.
pli-tv-kd3:14.2.4_0: Nanu bhagavatā anekapariyāyena musāvādo garahito, musāvādā veramaṇī pasatthā”ti.
pli-tv-kd3:14.3.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:14.3.2_0: atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ upanandaṁ sakyaputtaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-kd3:14.3.3_0: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, upananda, rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassāvāsaṁ paṭissuṇitvā visaṁvādesī”ti?
pli-tv-kd3:14.3.6_0: kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, rañño pasenadissa kosalassa vassāvāsaṁ paṭissuṇitvā visaṁvādessasi.
pli-tv-kd3:14.3.7_0: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena musāvādo garahito, musāvādā veramaṇī pasatthā.
pli-tv-kd3:14.4.1_0: “Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.4.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto passati antarāmagge dve āvāse bahucīvarake.
pli-tv-kd3:14.4.6_0: So tesu dvīsu āvāsesu vassaṁ vasati.
pli-tv-kd3:14.4.7_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.5.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.5.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.5.4_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.5.5_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.5.6_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.5.8_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.4_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.5_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.6_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.8_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.9_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.10_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.13_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.14_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.15_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.17_0: So taṁ sattāhaṁ anto sannivattaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-kd3:14.6.18_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca paññāyati, paṭissave ca anāpatti.
pli-tv-kd3:14.7.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.7.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.7.3_0: So sattāhaṁ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati.
pli-tv-kd3:14.7.4_2: bhikkhu taṁ āvāsaṁ na vā āgaccheyya, tassa,
pli-tv-kd3:14.8.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.8.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.8.4_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.9.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti purimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.9.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gantvā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.10.1_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:14.10.3_0: So taṁ sattāhaṁ anto sannivattaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-kd3:14.10.4_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno purimikā ca paññāyati, paṭissave ca anāpatti …pe…
pli-tv-kd3:14.10.5_0: so sattāhaṁ anāgatāya pavāraṇāya sakaraṇīyo pakkamati.
pli-tv-kd3:14.10.6_2: bhikkhu taṁ āvāsaṁ na vā āgaccheyya, tassa,
pli-tv-kd3:14.11.1_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti pacchimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.11.2_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.11.4_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pacchimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-kd3:14.11.5_0: Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā vassāvāso paṭissuto hoti pacchimikāya.
pli-tv-kd3:14.11.6_0: So taṁ āvāsaṁ gacchanto bahiddhā uposathaṁ karoti,
pli-tv-kd3:14.11.8_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pacchimikā ca na paññāyati, paṭissave ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.

pli-tv-kd3:14.11.25_0: So taṁ sattāhaṁ anto sannivattaṁ karoti.
pli-tv-kd3:14.11.26_0: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pacchimikā ca paññāyati, paṭissave ca anāpatti.

pli-tv-kd3:14.11.29_0: So sattāhaṁ anāgatāya komudiyā cātumāsiniyā sakaraṇīyo pakkamati.
